Title: My Husband Isn’t Pulling His Weight in Our Company
Description:
Today we’ll hear about: 

  • A wife frustrated that her husband won't step up in their business  
  • A young business owner looking for advice on how to market his small business 
  • When it’s time to make your first hire 
  • How Dave Ramsey compensates his team
